CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant lodged a claim under LAW no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL Coll . ( PERSON o úprave vlastníckych vzťahov k pôde a inému poľnohospodárskemu majetku – “ LAW ” ) for the restitution of an ownership interest of CARDINAL in an undivided plot of agricultural land which had belonged to her family before it was taken away during the communist regime .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant and the agricultural cooperative that was using the plot concluded a restitution agreement ( dohoda o vydaní ) concerning the modalities of the ownership interest transfer to her .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ORG úrad , odbor pozemkový , poľnohospodárstva a lesného hospodárstva ) approved the restitution agreement in accordance with LAW .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG informed the applicant that a third person ( ORG ) had filed an appeal with ORG ( PERSON pôdohospodárstva ) against the approval of DATE . ORG was an heir of a person to whom the plot was assigned ( prídelový vlastník – “ the assigned owner ” ) by the ORG after it had been taken away from the applicant ’s family . In her appeal , she claimed ownership of the plot . On DATE the applicant submitted her observations in reply to the appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG died .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Ministry annulled the approval of ORG of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the accelerated consolidation of the plot in accordance with LAW no . QUANTITY . ( PERSON o pozemkových úpravách , usporiadaní pozemkového vlastníctva , pozemkových úradoch , pozemkovom fonde a o pozemkových spoločenstvách – “ LAW ” ) . Pursuant to LAW of the LAW , the accelerated land consolidation was ordered for an interim period , namely until the completion of the ongoing general land consolidation proceedings in the area concerned or , alternatively , until the co - operative was dissolved without a legal successor ; whichever would occur earlier .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested that ORG should deal with her case expeditiously .
CARDINAL . On DATE the cooperative rescinded the restitution agreement of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG requested ORG ’s heir , ORG , to submit a decision on her estate .

CARDINAL . On DATE , on a motion of the cooperative , ORG asked ORG to submit to him the casefile concerning the applicant ’s case . In his decision of DATE , the ORG found that there had been undue delays in the proceedings in that ORG had failed to rule on the restitution agreement within the prescribed timelimit and that since DATE it had failed to take any procedural steps . The Prosecutor instructed ORG to deal with the case without undue delays .
CARDINAL . NORP In its decision of CARDINAL DATE ORG withheld its approval of the restitution agreement of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant petitioned for a judicial review of this decision . On DATE she supplemented her petition .
CARDINAL . On DATE a notary public determined ORG ’s estate .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON súd ) upheld the decision of ORG DATE . As a result , under LAW CARDINAL/CARDINAL , it became incumbent upon ORG to determine ex officio the applicant ’s restitution claim .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant requested ORG repeatedly , inter alia by letters of DATE , CARDINAL May , CARDINAL DATE and DATE , to determine her restitution case expeditiously .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered preparatory measures to be taken with a view to opening land consolidation proceedings under LAW in respect of the plot in issue .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened the land consolidation proceedings . It noted that “ heirs of the assigned owners had submitted competing ownership claims to the plot ” and that the rival claims had to be determined before it could be decided whether any part of the plot was to be restored to the applicant and , if so , which part . The applicant and another party to the proceedings filed appeals with ORG ( PERSON úrad ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decided to stay the proceedings on the applicant ’s restitution claim pending the outcome of the consolidation proceedings opened on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG asked the parties to the consolidation proceedings for their observations on the appeals filed by the applicant and by the other party .

CARDINAL . In its decision of DATE , ORG found factual inaccuracies and inconsistencies in the reasoning of ORG decision of DATE to open the consolidation proceedings in respect of the plot . It quashed this decision and sent the casefile back to ORG for reconsideration . The decision of DATE to stay the restitution proceedings was not affected by this decision .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a complaint with the Head of ORG ( ORG okresného úradu ) about the delays in her restitution proceedings . She demanded that the proceedings be resumed and her claim considered on the merits . On DATE the Head of ORG informed the applicant that ORG would determine the applicant ’s claim following the determination of the preliminary question in the consolidation proceedings , i.e. the competing ownership claims filed by the third parties .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested that ORG inform her about the state of her restitution proceedings .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG informed the applicant that the restitution proceedings were still stayed pending the determination of the preliminary question that was being dealt with in the consolidation proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing on the applicant ’s restitution claim .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG allowed the applicant ’s restitution claim . It noted that the allocation of the plot to the assigned owners had occurred prior to the formal confiscation of the ownership interest she was claiming . It concluded therefore that the allocation did not constitute an obstacle to the restitution of this share to the applicant . This decision became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . The applicant ’s title to the CARDINAL ownership interest in the plot has not yet been recorded in ORG ( kataster nehnuteľností ) .
CARDINAL . To date , no new decision to open the land consolidation proceedings has been taken .
